strings.dialog.jsonEditor.title: JSON Editor
strings.update.updaterNotFound: Updater does not exist, please select other update methods!
strings.trigger.fastPickModeDescription: When enabled, specific pick-up content will no longer be recognized, and black/white lists will be invalid.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.selectOptionMethodDescr: In background mode, it will automatically switch to using interaction keys.
strings.trigger.autoHangout.selectBranch: Select Hangout Branch (Bubble association selection not supported)
strings.trigger.autoHangout.selectBranchDescript: Options will be selected based on the keywords of the selected branch.
strings.trigger.autoHangout.optionDelayDescripti: Convenient for still seeing options clearly during auto-hangout.
strings.trigger.autoFishingDescription: Semi-automatic fishing requires manual casting (fully automatic fishing has been moved to an independent task)
strings.trigger.autoFishingMovedDescription: Fully automatic fishing has been moved to an independent task. Please use it on the independent task page with hotkeys.
strings.trigger.quickTeleportDescription: Automatically clicks teleport when clicking on a teleport waypoint on the large map (or when a teleport waypoint is in the list).
strings.trigger.teleportListInterval: Interval for clicking candidate list teleport waypoints (ms)
strings.trigger.teleportListIntervalDescription: Regular users please do not modify this setting. It needs to be configured according to text recognition time. Too low will cause click failures.
strings.trigger.teleportPopupWaitTime: Wait time for right-side teleport popup (ms)
strings.trigger.teleportPopupWaitTimeDescription: Regular users please do not modify this setting. It is not recommended to be less than 80ms. Too low will cause the teleport button to not be recognized.
strings.trigger.quickCombatDescription: Real-time recognition of the current active character. Long press the hotkey to repeatedly execute the character's combat macro.
strings.trigger.hotkeyConfigDescription: Regular users please do not modify this setting. It needs to be configured according to text recognition time. Too low will cause click failures.
strings.trigger.teleportPopupWaitTime2: Wait time for right-side teleport popup (ms)
strings.trigger.teleportPopupWaitTimeDescription: Regular users please do not modify this setting. It is not recommended to be less than 80ms. Too low will cause the teleport button to not be recognized.
strings.settings.keyBindingDescription: If you need to rebind keys in-game, please configure them here.
strings.settings.enableGlobalKeyMappingDescripti: Make key binding settings effective for external scripts.
strings.settings.mapTrackingFeatureMatchingMetho: Preferred Feature Matching Method for Map Tracking
Affects all map tracking functions, takes effect after restart.
strings.settings.worldMapTeleportSettingsDescrip: Configuration for teleport functions in map tracking, auto-domain, one-dragon, etc.
strings.settings.enableMapZoomDuringMovementDesc: Recommended to enable. Disabling this setting may cause errors in some scripts.
strings.settings.maxMouseMovementDistanceDescrip: [100-2000] Too large may cause the mouse to move out of the window.
strings.settings.mapZoomOutDistanceDescription: [>600] If the distance is greater than this, the map will be zoomed out to speed up teleportation.
strings.settings.mapZoomInDistanceDescription: [200-600] If the distance is less than this, the map will be zoomed in to improve movement accuracy.
strings.settings.mouseMovementIntervalDescriptio: [2-100] Smaller numbers mean faster mouse movement. If there is lag when moving the map, please increase this value.
strings.settings.statueOfTheSevenDescription: Used to specify the Statue of The Seven for healing.
strings.settings.useNearestStatue: Use Nearest Statue of The Seven for Healing
strings.settings.useNearestStatueDescription: When enabled, the nearest Statue of The Seven will be automatically selected, ignoring the specified location below.
strings.settings.moveAfterTeleportToStatue: Move After Teleporting to Statue of The Seven for Healing
strings.settings.moveAfterTeleportToStatueDescri: When enabled, it will automatically move towards the Statue of The Seven.
strings.settings.statueCountryDescription: Select the country where the Statue of The Seven is located.
strings.settings.statueRegionDescription: Select the region where the Statue of The Seven is located.
strings.settings.showMaskBorderDescription: Purple border around the game window.
strings.settings.useMaskSubform: Mask launches as Genshin Impact sub-window (Experimental Feature)
strings.settings.useMaskSubformDescription: The mask can fully follow the window movement, but there are some bugs. This configuration takes effect after restart.
strings.settings.healingWaitIntervalDescription: [1.0-30.0] How long to wait for healing after teleporting to the Statue of The Seven.
strings.settings.importLocalScriptRepo: Manually Import Local Script Repository (zip format)
strings.settings.importLocalScriptRepoDescriptio: Use when the script repository cannot be updated online.
strings.settings.otherSettingsDescription: Configure other functions, such as automatic recovery when focus is lost.
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindow: Force Activate Game Window when Game Loses Focus
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindowDescripti: Applicable to scheduler tasks and some independent tasks. When focus is lost, the game window will be automatically activated. If you want to switch out of the game window after enabling this, you can pause the task first, and then switch out.
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditions: Automatically Collect Expeditions During Map Teleport in Scheduler Path Tracking Tasks
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditionsDescripti: In scheduler path tracking tasks, when opening the large map to teleport, it will first check if there are expeditions to collect. If so, it will automatically collect them (calling the one-dragon collect rewards logic). Takes effect after selecting the collection city.
strings.settings.schedulerErrorRestartConfigDesc: When scheduler tasks encounter unexpected errors, BGI will automatically restart after accumulating a certain number of times to restore functionality.
strings.settings.errorCountDescription: When running scheduler tasks, the count of task failures due to exceptions. When the count is reached, BGI will restart.
strings.settings.farmingPlanConfigDescription: When enabled, if daily (starting at 4 AM) farming statistics exceed the limit (requires script support, check allow farming statistics flag, or control files in tracking file directory to record tracking file data), subsequent farming tasks will be skipped.
strings.settings.dailyEliteLimitDescription: When the number of elite mobs farmed reaches the limit, farming scripts with elite as the main target will be skipped.
strings.settings.dailyMobLimitDescription: When the number of regular mobs farmed reaches the limit, farming scripts with regular mobs as the main target will be skipped.
strings.settings.useMihoyoDataDescription: Uses miHoYo data (with a delay of about two to three hours) to correct farming quantities. Since miHoYo cookies expire after a period, they need to be reacquired. Therefore, if there is miHoYo data for the current day, the limit should be based on the configuration below; otherwise, it will be based on the limit configured above (considering killing monsters outside of farming, such as experience card time, so the estimated value may be different).
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyEliteLimitDescriptio: When the number of elite enemies farmed reaches the limit, farming scripts primarily targeting elite enemies will be skipped.
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyMobLimitDescription: When the number of regular mobs farmed reaches the limit, farming scripts primarily targeting regular mobs will be skipped.
strings.settings.mihoyoSettingsDescription: Used to configure miHoYo related information such as cookies.
strings.settings.syncCookieWithSchedulerDescript: When enabled, changes to the scheduler log or here will sync the cookie.
strings.keyBindings.switchToWalkOrRun: Toggle Walk/Run; Move Down in Specific Operation Modes
strings.keyBindings.jump: Jump; Move Up in Specific Operation Modes
strings.keyBindings.pickUpOrInteract: Pick Up/Interact (Auto-pickup managed by AutoPick module)
strings.keyBindings.openTheSettingsMenu: Open Gameplay System Settings (Within Serenitea Pot, Cat's Tail Tavern)
strings.keyBindings.openStellarReunion: Open Stellar Reunion (Effective during eligible period)
strings.keyBindings.elementalSight: Long Press to Open Elemental Sight
strings.settings.versionUpdateDescription: Check if a new version of the software is available.
strings.settings.betaVersionWarning: 【Beta Version】Highly unstable, please update with caution!
strings.settings.getLatestBetaFromGithub: Get latest beta from Github directly
strings.settings.aboutBetterGIDescription: View project, documentation, and other information.
strings.settings.restartGameTooDescription: When restarting BGI, also restart the game. This requires enabling the startup configuration on the homepage: 'Start Genshin Impact simultaneously' and 'Auto-enter game' for this configuration to take effect.
strings.settings.combatFailureIsErrorDescription: In farming scripts, the actual number of successful combats must be greater than or equal to the expected number of combats to succeed, otherwise an exception will be thrown. This can solve issues where infinite freezes might occur during farming, such as failed map opening, team switching, or getting stuck on the 'press Z' switch interface or Blessing of the Welkin Moon card. However, you need to determine your team's combat strength to avoid situations where continuous failures exceed the configured number of failures, leading to an infinite restart loop.
strings.settings.incompletePathIsErrorDescriptio: A stricter condition than combat failure. If this option is checked, and a tracking file is not fully executed, it counts as a failure. This option requires high stability of your tracking tasks. It is recommended to first observe the logs and check if there are continuous red flags exceeding the failure count before enabling this option.
strings.app.title: Better Genshin Impact
strings.settings.title: Settings
strings.settings.exitToTray: Minimize to System Tray on Exit
strings.settings.exitToTrayDescription: When enabled, the exit button in the top right corner will minimize to the system tray and continue running. Right-click the tray icon to exit.
strings.settings.screenshotDescription: Take screenshots to the log/screenshot folder via hotkey.
strings.settings.screenshotHotkeyDescription: Screenshots are mainly used for debugging exceptions, creating training sets, and quickly obtaining screenshots of equal width and height.
strings.settings.screenshotUidCoverDescription: Generated screenshots will cover the UID information in the bottom right corner.
strings.settings.httpServerDescription: Can be called by external programs, takes effect after restart.
strings.settings.httpServerPortDescription: Port number for HTTP server to listen on, range 1-65535.
strings.settings.showLogWindowDescription: Show log window on startup for easy viewing of log files.
strings.settings.showTaskStatusDescription: Show real-time task running status on startup.
strings.settings.showGameFpsDescription: Restart required after modifying this setting, may cause bugs in the game.
strings.settings.showImageRecognitionDescription: Real-time display of various image recognition results.
strings.settings.enableUidCoverDescription: Cover the UID information in the bottom right corner.
strings.settings.showMinimapDirectionsDescriptio: Display North, South, East, West directions around the minimap.
strings.home.subtitle: Better Genshin Impact, Free and Open Source
strings.home.captureDescription: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started. Click to expand startup related configurations.
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart1: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started.
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart2: Click to expand startup related configurations
strings.home.captureModeDescription: BitBlt is recommended, with fewer issues.
strings.home.triggerIntervalDescription: Default is 50ms. It is not recommended for general users to adjust this value. See documentation for specific adjustment methods.
strings.home.aiInferenceDeviceDescription: Requires program restart to take effect after modification.
strings.home.testCaptureDescription: Test feature to check the effect of several screenshot modes.
strings.home.manualSelectWindow: Manually Select Window (use when Genshin Impact window cannot be found)
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescription: Use when Genshin Impact is already launched but clicking start still shows 'cannot find window'.
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescriptionFixed: Use when Genshin Impact is already launched but clicking start still shows 'cannot find window'.
strings.home.autoCloseWin11Optimization: Automatically close Windows 11 window optimization to support BitBlt
strings.home.autoCloseWin11OptimizationDescripti: Changes take effect after restarting the game.
strings.home.launchGenshinDescription: When the screenshot tool starts, if Genshin Impact is not running, it will automatically start Genshin Impact.
strings.home.launchGenshinSimultaneouslyDescript: When the screenshot tool starts, if Genshin Impact is not running, it will automatically start Genshin Impact.
strings.home.genshinInstallPath: Genshin Impact Installation Location (Cloud Genshin Impact linkage launch not supported)
strings.home.genshinInstallLocation: Genshin Impact Installation Location (Cloud Genshin Impact linkage launch not supported)
strings.home.launchParametersDescription: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please do not fill this in.
strings.home.launchParametersWarning: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please do not fill this in.
strings.home.autoEnterGameDescription: Automatically enter the game after Genshin Impact starts (auto-open door, claim Blessing of the Welkin Moon).
strings.home.autoClickMonthlyCard: Auto Click Claim Blessing of the Welkin Moon
strings.home.autoClickMonthlyCardDescription: Automatically click Blessing of the Welkin Moon after entering the game, if available.
strings.home.useStarwardRecord: Use Starward to Record Game Time
strings.home.useStarwardRecordDescription: Starward will automatically record time after the game starts.
strings.home.wgcBitmapCache: WindowsGraphicsCapture Screenshot Mode Enable Bitmap Cache
strings.home.wgcBitmapCacheDescription: If Genshin Impact is black screen or frame dropping, try disabling this feature and restarting the software.
strings.macro.title: Macros & Quick Operations
strings.macro.oneKeyMacroDescription: Automatically identifies the current combat character and executes the corresponding macro when the hotkey is pressed.
strings.macro.hotkeyTriggerModeDescription: Repeat on hold: execute repeatedly when held down, stop when released; Click: execute once per click.
strings.macro.macroConfigDescription: Configure macros for each character, e.g., Neuvillette's A key combo. See instructions.
strings.macro.defaultMacroPriorityDescription: When a character's macroPriority is set to 0, this default macro number (1~5) is used.
strings.macro.characterMacroSettingsDescription: Official game support for configuring macros for each character. You can right-click on the character interface to set the macroPriority field (1-5). Set to 0 to use the default combat priority above.
strings.macro.neuvilletteDescription: Automatically performs horizontal Normal Attacks while orbiting. Requires hotkey configuration to use.
strings.macro.mouseDistanceDescription: Value is in pixels. Larger value means faster movement. Please do not set it too high.
strings.macro.mouseIntervalDescription: Set an interval greater than 0. Too small may lead to no effect when switching tabs, similar advice applies.
strings.macro.fastEnhanceDescription: Automatically clicks the enhance button. Requires hotkey configuration to use.
strings.macro.enhanceDelayDescription: If the delay is too small to enhance normally, please increase this setting appropriately.
strings.macro.oneKeyBuyDescription: Used in shop/exchange interface. Select item first, then start continuous clicking to purchase.
strings.macro.teapotDescription: Automatically opens chests, collects furnishings, collects animals, etc., with one click.
strings.macro.confirmCancelDescription: Bind hotkeys to replace Genshin Impact's confirm/cancel buttons.
strings.macro.spaceHold: Long Press Space (Replaces Genshin Impact Space)
strings.macro.spaceHoldDescription: Great for climbing. Automatically long presses the Spacebar's long press function. Not recommended to enable.
strings.macro.fHold: Long Press F (Replaces Genshin Impact F)
strings.macro.fHoldDescription: Great for auto-pickup. Less useful for features that require auto-pickup.
strings.notification.title: Notification Settings
strings.notification.allowJsNotificationsDescrip: Allows JavaScript scripts to send notifications.
strings.notification.qqNumberDescription: Enter the QQ number to receive messages.
strings.notification.groupNumberDescription: Enter the group number to receive messages.
strings.notification.emailSettings: Email Related Settings (Account password saved locally)
strings.notification.emailPasswordDescription: Enter email password or authorization code.
strings.notification.barkDeviceKeysDescription: Separate multiple devices with commas, semicolons, or spaces.
strings.notification.barkApiEndpointDescription: Enter Bark API endpoint, e.g., api.day.app.
strings.notification.barkGroupDescription: Display in notification center by group.
strings.notification.discordWebhookUrlDescriptio: Enter the Webhook URL provided by Discord.
strings.notification.discordWebhookUsernameDescr: Name displayed for the message. If empty, the name preset in Discord will be used.
strings.notification.discordWebhookAvatarUrlDesc: Avatar displayed for the message. If empty, the avatar preset in Discord will be used.
strings.notification.discordImageEncoderDescript: PNG for lossless, JPEG for fast compression, WebP for small file size. Choose as needed.
strings.scriptGroup.gadgetIntervalDescription: Automatically use gadgets during movement. Enter 0 to not use.
strings.scriptGroup.onlyInTeleportRecoverDescrip: Only recovers at Statue of The Seven when the path is at a teleport waypoint.
strings.scriptGroup.skipDuringDescription: After completing a route, if the time is within the configured range (0-23), this map tracking task will be skipped for the rest of the day. This is suitable for continuous fallback tasks, for example, wanting to AFK overnight and start new tasks after 4 AM.
strings.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCd: Optimize Character Switching by Skill CD
strings.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCdDescription: Based on the entered character(s) and their cooldowns, decides whether to skip a character's move if their elemental skill CD is not finished, optimizing the combat flow. Can enter character names (comma-separated), or character names and numbers (semicolon-separated). For example: Baizhu;Zhongli,12;. If only character name, uses internal CD check (or negative number). If character name and number, number is used as skill CD (seconds).
strings.scriptGroup.autoCombatEndDetectionDescri: Stops automatic combat when combat is detected to have ended.
strings.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckDescripti: Quickly check for end of combat. In a single script run, can check every few seconds (default 5) or after a specific character's action (when each character completes their turn in the script).
strings.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckParamsDes: Parameters for faster combat end check, can be numbers and character names, separated by semicolons. For example: 5;Baizhu;Zhongli;. If a number (less than or equal to 0 means no time-based check, unit in seconds), it specifies the check interval. If a character name, the check is performed after that character completes one round of operations. The check after each round remains unchanged.
strings.scriptGroup.combatEndCheckDelayDescripti: Delay for checking combat end. The delay after different character's moves may not be the same, default is 1.5 seconds. Can also specify delay in seconds after specific characters. If no character name is specified, the default value is used. Format: 2.5;Baizhu,1.5;Zhongli,1.0;
strings.scriptGroup.keyPressCheckDelay: Delay After Key Press Before Check
strings.scriptGroup.keyPressCheckDelayDescriptio: Delay after pressing a key to switch teams to check for screen color blocks, default is 0.45 seconds. If frequent misjudgments occur, this value can be appropriately increased, for example, to 0.75. Ensure this delay does not actually bring up the team configuration interface.
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickupDropsDescription: Picks up drops around after combat as much as possible (better with Kazuha).
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickupDurationDescriptio: Unit in seconds. 0 means no auto-pickup of drops.
strings.scriptGroup.executeKazuhaLongEAfterComba: Execute Kazuha Long E After Combat
After combat, if Kaedehara Kazuha exists, Kazuha's long E will be executed after combat to pick up materials with that character.
strings.scriptGroup.pickupCombatThresholdDescrip: Pickup combat threshold. When the number of combat encounters is less than a certain number, the drop pickup and Kazuha pickup configurations are not triggered when ending combat. Only takes effect if not less than 2.
strings.scriptGroup.onlyPickupEliteDrops: Only Pick Up Elite Drops Mode
strings.scriptGroup.onlyPickupEliteDropsDescript: Requires path file support. Only takes effect if 'distinguish monster pickup' is checked. Can be viewed through repository tags. Elite monsters can be marked in 'More' > 'Extended Configuration' > 'Monster Tags' for waypoints. Only picks up waypoints tagged as elite or legendary. Non-elite allow auto-pickup: Drops underfoot during combat can be automatically picked up, but Kazuha pickup and auto-pickup configuration logic will not be executed. Non-elite disable pickup: Drops underfoot during combat will not be automatically picked up.
strings.scriptGroup.kazuhaPickupTeamNameDescript: After combat, if Kazuha is not present, switch to a team with Kazuha (based on Kazuha pickup enabled and team name filled in). This is suitable for situations where you need to replace Kazuha's position when more experience farming is needed. Combat strategy is recommended to be compatible with both teams to prevent combat from continuing if team switching fails.
strings.scriptGroup.combatTimeoutDescription: Automatically stops combat if it exceeds a certain duration.
strings.scriptGroup.shellExecutionConfigDescript: Shell commands executed in this group will use this configuration. If disabled, default configuration will be used.
strings.scriptGroup.disableShellTasksDescription: If enabled, Shell tasks will be skipped.
strings.scriptGroup.shellExecutionTimeoutDescrip: Maximum time to wait for command return, in seconds. If time <= 0, no waiting, return immediately.
strings.scriptGroup.hideCommandWindowDescription: Recommended to enable, otherwise there will be a large black box.
strings.scriptGroup.logCommandOutputDescription: If enabled, command output will be displayed in the Log. If disabled, it will not be displayed. (Only displays if command executes successfully with output)
strings.scriptGroup.pathingActionConfigDescripti: Some actions will be performed when map tracking reaches the target point. Some actions must have corresponding characters configured in the party.
strings.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndex: Normal Attack Character Index in Party
strings.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndexDe: Generally used to collect plants that require elemental reactions.
strings.scriptGroup.elementalSkillCharacterIndex: Elemental Skill Character Index in Party
Used for collecting Cor Lapis, etc.
strings.pathingConfig.title: Map Tracking Settings (Priority from high to low, UI style still has issues unsolved)
strings.pathingConfig.partySettings: Party Switching Settings (Automatically switches to the corresponding party if there are eligible actions or collectibles in the path)
strings.pathingConfig.avatarSettings: Character Settings (When multiple characters meet conditions, prioritize using the one with smaller party index in-game)
strings.pathingConfig.gadgetIntervalDescription: Automatically use gadgets during movement. Enter 0 to not use.
strings.pathingConfig.onlyTeleportRecoverDescrip: Only recovers at the Statue of The Seven when the path is at a teleport waypoint.
strings.task.title: Independent Tasks (Experimental)
strings.task.autoGeniusInvokationDescription: Fully automatic match - Click to view usage tutorial
strings.task.stopTaskDescription: Stop the execution of the independent task below.
strings.task.selectDeckDescription: Select the deck configuration you want to use.
strings.task.setDelayDescription: If network latency causes recognition to be too fast, you can appropriately increase the waiting time for unrecognized items.
strings.task.autoWoodDescription: Equip "Woodland Favor". Refresh wood collection by loop teleporting -
strings.task.batchOperationsDescription: Batch operations will affect all running tasks. Please use with caution.
strings.task.getGridIconsDescription: Captures item icons from various interfaces in the game for development and debugging.
strings.task.pressEscTwice: Press ESC Twice (one ESC is to dismiss the 'wood full' prompt)
strings.task.pressEscTwiceDescription: Use this function when one type of wood is full in areas with multiple wood collection points.
strings.task.autoTrackDescription: Auto track story and world quests (debug mode feature).
strings.task.autoTrackDebugDescription: This feature is visible only in debug mode and is used for automatically tracking and completing story quests.
strings.task.autoMoveDescription: Auto move, fly, swim, climb (reserved feature).
strings.task.autoMoveReservedDescription: This is a reserved feature for automatic movement, flying, swimming, climbing, and other movement operations.
strings.task.autoTrackInDevelopment: Auto Track Feature Under Development (Debug Mode)
strings.task.autoMoveInDevelopment: Auto Move Feature Under Development (Reserved Feature)
strings.task.restartAllTasksInDevelopment: Restart all tasks feature under development.
strings.task.redeemCodePlaceholder: Please enter redeem codes here, one per line.
strings.task.loopCountDescription: Number of woodcutting loops. Set 0 for infinite loop until manually stopped.
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimit: Enable OCR Wood Limit (1080P game resolution only)
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimitDescription: OCR recognizes cumulative wood count during woodcutting, automatically stops woodcutting when limit is reached.
strings.task.woodCountLimit: Wood Count Limit (Genshin Impact daily limit per wood type is 2000)
strings.task.woodCountLimitDescription: Takes effect after setting wood count limit. Automatically stops woodcutting when the set limit is reached.
strings.task.gadgetDelayDescription: If the pop-up prompt for woodcutting after using a gadget is too quick, you can adjust this value.
strings.task.autoFightDescription: Automatically executes the selected combat strategy -
strings.task.optimizeByCd: Optimize Party Members by Skill CD
strings.task.optimizeByCdDescription: Optimizes the party based on party members' skill cooldowns. If an Elemental Skill CD is not ready, that member will be skipped to optimize the combat flow. For multiple members' skill CDs, format with commas, e.g., Neuvillette;Zhongli,12;Furina. If a member's skill CD is empty (or the skill CD is also less than 0), no optimization is performed. For multiple numbers, the first value represents the skill CD (seconds).
strings.task.autoDetectFightEndDescription: Stops automatic combat when combat is detected to have ended.
strings.task.fasterFightEndCheckDescription: Faster combat end detection. In a type of script, by default, it checks every certain period (default 5 seconds) whether a specific character has died (when each character processes the script).
strings.trigger.title: Real-time Trigger Automation Task Settings
strings.trigger.autoPick.title: Auto Pick
strings.trigger.autoPick.description: Automatically presses F to pick up/interact when options are not NPC dialogue and not in the blacklist.
strings.trigger.autoPick.fastModeDescription: When enabled, specific pick-up content will no longer be recognized, and black/white lists will be invalid.
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngine: Select Auto Pick Text Recognition Engine
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngineDescription: Paddle recognizes all text, slow speed, low consumption; Yap recognizes partial text, fast and accurate, high consumption.
strings.trigger.autoPick.blacklistDescription: Excludes NPC dialogue, various interaction options, items not needed for pickup, etc.
strings.trigger.autoPick.whitelistDescription: Content that needs to be actively interacted with by pressing F. Please use with blacklist.
strings.trigger.autoPick.customKeyDescription: Default is F, includes E key. Other keys need to be changed accordingly, see documentation for details.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.title: Auto Story Skip
strings.trigger.autoSkip.description: Quickly skip story text, automatically select options, automatically submit items, etc.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundMode: Enable Background Mode (Only uses interaction keys for story)
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundModeDescripti: Do not minimize the game. The mouse will automatically return to the game when not in dialogue.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.quickSkipDescription: If you want to listen to the full main story voiceover, you can disable this function.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionPriorityDescripti: Prioritize selecting the first option, prioritizing the last option, or not selecting any option.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionDelayDescription: Convenient for still seeing options clearly during auto-story.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.submitGoodsDescription: When the item submission interface appears in dialogue, it will automatically submit, supporting multiple items.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.closePopupDescription: Closes pop-up pages that appear in dialogue, may accidentally close map or camera.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.dailyRewardsDescription: When conversing with Katheryne, will automatically "Claim Daily Commission" rewards.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.reExploreDescription: Automatically claims completed expedition rewards and re-dispatches.
strings.trigger.autoHangout.title: Auto Hangout
strings.trigger.autoHangout.description: This function will only take effect when auto-story is enabled, and will automatically select hangout options.
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButton: Auto Skip When Skip Button Exists
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButtonDescriptio: Automatically clicks the skip button when it exists in the top left corner during a hangout.
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branch: Select Hangout Branch (Bubble association selection not supported)
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branchDescription: Options will be selected based on the keywords of the selected branch.
strings.dialog.confirmClearTasks: Are you sure you want to clear all tasks?
strings.dialog.confirmMigrateConfig: Detected old BetterGI configuration. Do you want to migrate the configuration and clean up old directories?
strings.dialog.migrateConfigSuccess: Configuration migration successful. The program will automatically exit. Please manually restart BetterGI.
strings.dialog.confirmResetRepo: Are you sure you want to reset the script repository? If cannot connect, please use this function first, then update the script repository again.
strings.dialog.securityError: Detected that BetterGI is located on C drive, directory permissions may fail to modify, which may lead to WebView2 related functions being unusable.
strings.hotkey.toggleLogStatusWindow: Toggle Log and Status Window Display
strings.hotkey.manualQuickTeleportTrigger: Manually Trigger Quick Teleport Hotkey (Hold to activate)
strings.hotkey.holdToRotateView: Hold to Rotate View - Neuvillette Orbiting
strings.hotkey.quickBuyShopItems: Press for Quick Shop Item Purchase
strings.hotkey.quickSereniteaPot: Press for Quick Serenitea Pot Entry/Exit
strings.hotkey.quickClickConfirmButton: Quick Click Genshin Impact Confirm Button
strings.hotkey.quickClickCancelButton: Quick Click Genshin Impact Cancel Button
strings.hotkey.devGetBigMapPosition: (Dev) Get Current Big Map Center Position
strings.hotkey.quickClickButtonSuccess: Trigger quick click Genshin Impact {0} button: Success
strings.hotkey.quickClickButtonNotFound: Trigger quick click Genshin Impact {0} button: Button image not found
strings.jslist.scriptHasConfigWarning: This script has configuration. It may not run correctly without configuration. It is recommended to add it to the [Scheduler] and modify the configuration via right-click before use!
strings.jslist.version: Version: {0} This script does not provide custom configuration.
strings.dialog.onlyJsHasConfig: Only JS scripts have custom configuration.
strings.dialog.configGroupExistsMessage: Config group {0} already exists, please do not add repeatedly.
strings.dialog.copyConfigGroupFailed: Config group {0} already exists, copy failed.
strings.dialog.renameConfigGroupFailed: Config group {0} already exists, rename failed.
strings.dialog.selectJsScript: Please select the JS script you want to add.
strings.dialog.selectKeyMouseScript: Please select the key/mouse script you want to add.
strings.dialog.selectPathingTask: Please select the map tracking task you want to add.
strings.dialog.shellWarning: Executing shell commands carries extremely high risks. Please ensure you have reviewed and confirmed the safety of the commands before running!\nDuring shell execution, the game may lose focus.
strings.dialog.enterShellCommand: Please enter the shell command you want to execute.
strings.dialog.blacklistConfig: Blacklist configuration, one record per line.
strings.dialog.blacklistPlaceholder:
Please enter blacklist configuration here, one record per line.
Example:
Chests in Mondstadt
Slime Condensate
Traveling Merchant's Price

strings.toast.selectRepoChannel: Please select a script repository update channel.
strings.toast.updatingRepo: Updating script repository, please wait patiently...
strings.toast.repoUpdateSuccess: Script repository updated successfully! Please restart.
strings.toast.repoAlreadyLatest: Script repository is already the latest.
strings.toast.waitForUpdateComplete: Please wait for the current update to complete before setting.
strings.toast.repoResetSuccess: Script repository reset successful. Please update the script repository again.
strings.toast.repoNotExist: Script repository does not exist, please update first.
strings.toast.startScreenshotFirst: Please enable screenshots on the startup page before using this function.
strings.toast.useSchedulerForMultiple: When executing multiple map tracking tasks, please use the scheduler function.
strings.toast.noCookieWarning: No cookie filled in, only settings statistics this time:

strings.toast.mihoyoApiErrorNoStats: miHoYo API error, only setting statistics this time:
strings.toast.selectCombatStrategy: Please select a combat strategy from the left list first:
strings.toast.combatStrategyNotExist: The currently selected auto-combat strategy file does not exist.
strings.toast.noSecretTreasureConfig: No Serenitea Pot configuration set, please set first.
strings.toast.selectTreasureWarning: Selection is empty, please select treasure.
strings.toast.selectConfigAndTask: Please select config group and task first.

strings.hotkey.title: Hotkey Settings
strings.hotkey.description: Global hotkeys only support key combinations and function keys; single letters cannot directly take effect. If input methods are not supported, it is recommended to close the input method and buttons, or switch the hotkey type. Some conflicting functions are not recommended for global hotkeys.
strings.scheduler.experimentalSelectOrAddGroup: (Experimental) Please select or add a config group in the left pane.
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddModifyDrag: Right-click in the left pane to add/modify config groups, drag to sort config groups. Within a config group, you can add and configure Javascript scripts, key/mouse scripts, etc., and control execution times, order, etc.
strings.scheduler.clickToViewTutorial: Click to view scheduler usage tutorial.
strings.scheduler.rightClickOrButtonToAdd: Right-click in the left pane to add a config group, or click the button below to add a config group directly.
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddDragToReorder: Right-click in the list below to add configurations, drag to adjust execution order. Supports BetterGI's Javascript scripts, key/mouse recording scripts, etc. The scheduler allows you to set script execution times, order, and more.
strings.scheduler.exportTasksModifiedByControlFi: Export Tasks Modified by Control File
strings.scheduler.name: Name
strings.jsScript.title: Custom Javascript Scripts (Experimental Feature)
strings.jsScript.description: You can use Javascript to call various BetterGI capabilities in Genshin Impact. Please use in the scheduler!
strings.jsScript.viewTutorial: Click to view Javascript script usage and writing tutorial.
strings.jsScript.name: Name
strings.scriptRepo.title: Script Repository
strings.hardware.title: Inference Device Configuration
strings.hardware.restartRequired: Restart required after modification. Please confirm modification may cause program abnormality.
strings.hardware.inferenceDeviceTypeDescription: Select the hardware device type for inference. CPU is used by default.
strings.hardware.gpuDeviceIdDescription: Specify the GPU device number to use. Set to 0 for default configuration. Can be viewed in Task Manager.
strings.hardware.optimizedModel: Output Optimized Model File to Cache
strings.hardware.optimizedModelDescription: Note: Using on unsupported executors will cause exceptions. Disabled by default.
strings.hardware.cudaDeviceIdDescription: Specify the CUDA device number. Set to 0 for default configuration. Can be viewed in nvidia-smi.
strings.hardware.autoAppendCudaPathDescription: Automatically adds system CUDA environment path. Enabled by default.
strings.hardware.additionalPathDescription: Additional PATH, separated by semicolons, default is empty. Can be used to add DLL paths.
strings.hardware.enableTensorRtCacheDescription: Improves TensorRT model loading speed. Enabled by default.
strings.hardware.embedTensorRtCacheDescription: Embeds engine cache into model files. Enabled by default.
strings.hardware.cacheManagementDescription: Old version cache files can be deleted manually.
strings.hardware.forceCpuOcrDescription: Resolves some GPU inference performance issues. Enabled by default.
strings.update.defaultServerDescription: Regular users can click to update directly.
strings.update.mirrorServerDescription: Mirror users can enter CDK for high-speed updates.
strings.update.hutaoCloudDescription: Hutao Cloud CDN users can use Hutao Cloud CDN for high-speed updates.
strings.welcome.openSourceFree: 🔹 This software is open source and free. If you like the project, please give it a 🌟Star ->
strings.welcome.neverAuthorized: ❗This software has never authorized any third-party platforms for
strings.welcome.ifPaidFor: . If you paid for this software (Idle Fish, Taobao, etc.), please report the seller and demand a
strings.picker.doubleClickToSelect: Double-click to select the window to capture.
strings.captureTest.title: Screenshot Test Window
strings.about.title: BetterGI Better Genshin Impact
strings.about.author: Author:
strings.mapPathing.title: Map Tracking (Experimental Feature)
strings.mapPathing.description: Can achieve functions like auto-collection, auto-mining, auto-fishing, etc. Please use in the scheduler!
strings.mapPathing.viewTutorial: Click to view map tracking recording and usage tutorial.
strings.mapPathing.name: Name
strings.oneDragon.craft.title: Synthesize Condensed Resin
strings.oneDragon.dailyCommission.title: Daily Commission
strings.keyBindings.title: Key Binding Settings
strings.keyBindings.description: Key settings here apply by default to built-in functions except auto-pickup, fishing, music game, and woodcutting. Enable 'Global Key Mapping' in settings for JS scripts, combat scripts, and simplified strategy scripts in map tracking to take effect. Please manually set pickup keys, Stellar Reunion keys, and hide UI keys.
strings.scriptGroup.pathingConfigDescription: Force modify movement; set healer/shielder character's index in party.
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickDescription: Recommended to enable. Picks up drops and collectibles along the path.
strings.scriptGroup.partyNameDescription: Party name is the name you manually set for your party configuration in-game.
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeSwitch: Force Go to Safe Statue Area Before Switching Parties
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeDescription: Go to Statue before switching party members to avoid switching failures due to abnormal position/status.
strings.scriptGroup.guardianAvatarDescription: Healer/shielder character position. Recommended: Qiqi, Layla.
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillInterv: May need to be set slightly longer than actual skill CD.
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillLongPr: Zhongli long-press shield, Qiqi long-press transformation, etc.
strings.scriptGroup.mainAvatarIndex: 【Movement Slot】Main Movement Character Index in Party
strings.scriptGroup.mainAvatarDescription: Recommended to be the same as the survival slot, no special configuration needed.
strings.scriptGroup.combatConfigDescription: Enable the above map tracking configuration, enable this item to set combat configuration. Disable this item for settings in party configuration.
strings.scriptGroup.taskCycleConfigDescription: Determines whether to execute this configuration group on a daily basis.
strings.scriptGroup.boundaryTimeDescription: Boundary time, usually 0 or 4. Set 0 for starting at 0:00, set 4 for starting at 4:00 AM. Less than 4:00 AM counts as the previous day.
strings.scriptGroup.cycleDescription: Different materials have different cycles, configure as needed: ore cycle 3, ascension material cycle 2, or set how many days to execute once.
strings.scriptGroup.indexDescription: Execution cycle index, based on timestamp days (adjusted by boundary time), modulo cycle plus 1. Matches configuration value will execute, otherwise skips. Can be understood as which day in the cycle it executes.
strings.scriptGroup.calculateExecutionIndexDescr: Click the calculate button to calculate today's execution index (which day of the cycle today is).
strings.keyMouseRecord.title: Key & Mouse Recording Playback
strings.keyMouseRecord.description: Records keyboard and mouse operations and plays them back.
strings.keyMouseRecord.name: Name
strings.notification.message.dragonEnd: One-Dragon and config group tasks completed.
strings.notification.message.taskCancelNormal: Task manually cancelled or completed normally.
strings.notification.message.dailyRewardUnclaime: Daily reward not claimed, please check manually!
strings.notification.error.unexpectedError: Scheduler task encountered an unexpected error, restarting BGI automatically.
strings.notification.error.screenshotFailed: Failed to capture test notification screenshot.
strings.notification.error.feishuWebhookFailed: Feishu webhook call failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.feishuTokenFailed: Failed to get Feishu access token, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.feishuUploadFailed: Feishu image upload failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.telegramNetworkError: Network error when sending Telegram notification: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinImageFailed: Work Weixin image Webhook call failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinTextFailed: Work Weixin text Webhook call failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinEndpointEmp: Work Weixin Webhook address is empty.
strings.notification.error.feishuImageKeyNotFoun: Feishu uploaded image key not found.
strings.notification.error.telegramTimeout: Telegram API request timed out, please check your network connection.
strings.notification.error.telegramChatIdInvalid: Please send a message to the bot first and check if the chat ID is correct.
strings.notification.error.telegramApiNotFound: Telegram API not found (404). Please verify your bot token is correct. URL: {0}
strings.notification.error.oneBotIdRequired: OneBot requires user ID or group ID.
strings.notification.error.telegramEndpointEmpty: Telegram bot token or chat ID not set.
strings.notification.error.telegramSendFailed: Telegram message send failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workweixinEndpointEmp: Work Weixin webhook address not set.
strings.notification.error.workweixinSendFailed: Work Weixin notification failed, status code: {0}
strings.notification.deviceKeyDescription: Separate multiple devices with commas, semicolons or spaces.
strings.notification.notificationGroupDescriptio: Display in notification center by group.
strings.notification.savePushHistoryDescription: Choose whether to save push history.
strings.notification.chatIdDescription: Enter the chat ID to receive messages.
strings.notification.apiBaseUrlDescription: Leave blank to use official API, or enter third-party API address.
strings.log.warning.notificationMessageFileNotEx: Notification message file does not exist: {0}
strings.pathingConfig.mapTrackingSettings: Map Tracking Settings (Priority from high to low, UI style still has issues unsolved)
strings.pathingConfig.teamSwitchSettings: Team Switching Settings (Automatically switches to the corresponding team if there are eligible actions or collectibles in the path)
strings.pathingConfig.characterSettings: Character Settings (When multiple characters meet conditions, prioritize using the one with smaller party index in-game)
strings.pathingConfig.onlyRecoverAtTeleportDescr: Only recovers at the Statue of The Seven when the path is at a teleport waypoint.
strings.update.getLatestVersionFailed: Failed to get BetterGI latest version information.
strings.update.mirrorUpdateCheckFailed: Mirror update check failed, unexpected serious error, please contact Mirror's technical support in time.\nError code: {0}, Error message: {1}
strings.update.mirrorCdkExpired: Mirror CDK expired, please reacquire CDK.
strings.update.mirrorCdkDailyLimitReached: Mirror CDK daily download limit reached.
strings.update.mirrorCdkTypeMismatch: Mirror CDK type and resource to be downloaded do not match.
strings.update.mirrorUpdateCheckFailedWithMessag: Mirror update check failed, error message: {0}
strings.update.getChangelogFailed: Failed to get changelog, please choose whether to update yourself!
strings.script.taskReachedForbiddenTime: {0} has reached forbidden execution time, skipping task.
strings.script.taskSettingIncorrectOrCompleted: {0} task settings are incorrect, or daily task already executed, skipping task.
strings.script.taskExceededCycle: {0} task has exceeded execution cycle, current value {1} != config value {2}, skipping task, waiting for tomorrow.
strings.script.groupLoadedAndStarting: Script group {0} loaded, total {1} scripts, starting execution.
strings.script.scriptExecutionError: An exception occurred during script execution.
strings.script.scriptExecutionCompleted: √ Script execution completed: {0}, Time taken: {1} min {2:0.000} sec
strings.script.consecutiveUnexpectedErrors: Consecutive unexpected errors occurred, restarting BGI automatically.
strings.script.notInMainUiWaiting: Currently not in the game's main UI, waiting to enter main UI to execute task...
strings.script.mainUiInstructions: If you are already in the game's main UI, please press ESC to exit the current interface or wait 30 seconds to attempt to automatically click an empty area, allowing foreground tasks to execute normally!
strings.oneDragon.error.domainNotSelected: The domain to be farmed in the one-dragon configuration {0}, skipping.

strings.mapPathing.devTools.mapSelectionNote: (Map selection below affects the independent map where path recording is located)
strings.dialog.updateFailed: Update failed. You can try resetting the repository and updating again. Reason for failure: {0}

strings.log.error.aspectRatioNotSupported: Current game resolution is not 16:9. All independent tasks and full-auto task related functions such as one-dragon, party recognition, map teleportation, and map tracking will not function properly!
strings.log.warning.msiAfterburnerRunning: MSI Afterburner detected. If information is displayed on a specific UI element that obscures image recognition features, recognition may fail. Please close MSI Afterburner or adjust the information position and try again!
strings.log.warning.gameLanguageNotChinese: Current game language {0} is not Simplified Chinese. Some functions may not work properly.

strings.oneDragon.tcg.title: Auto Genius Invokation
strings.message.scriptRepoImportSuccess: Script repository offline package imported successfully!
strings.message.scriptRepoImportFailed: Script repository offline package import failed, incorrect script repository offline package content!
strings.error.genshinInstallPathNotFound: Genshin Impact installation path not found.
strings.error.genshinWindowNotFound: Genshin Impact window not found, please launch Genshin Impact first!
strings.error.triggerIntervalMustBePositive: Trigger interval must be greater than 0.
strings.keyMouseRecord.stopRecordingError: An exception occurred when stopping recording.
strings.keyMouseRecord.playbackError: An exception occurred during script playback.
strings.keyMouseRecord.editNamePrompt: Please enter the new name (actually the file name).
strings.mapPathing.directoryDescription: This is a directory containing multiple map tracking tasks.
strings.oneDragon.readScriptGroupFailed: Failed to read script group configuration.
strings.oneDragon.selectTasksToAdd: Select task groups to add (multi-select allowed).
strings.oneDragon.notAffectMoney: Will not affect Mora and currency acquisition.
strings.oneDragon.enterNewConfigName: Please enter a new configuration name.
strings.oneDragon.loadOnlyOnce: Load State Check Only Run Once
strings.oneDragon.commandLineStart: Start One-Dragon via Command Line Arguments
strings.oneDragon.getConfigFromArgs: Get One-Dragon Configuration Name from Command Line Arguments
strings.oneDragon.copyTaskListForExecution: Copy TaskList for execution, do not modify.
strings.oneDragon.noConfigGroupTasks: No config group tasks, exiting execution!
strings.oneDragon.executeConfigGroupFailed: Failed to execute config group task.
strings.oneDragon.skipRemainingTasks: Skipping remaining tasks, no further execution.
strings.oneDragon.rightClickToAddOrDeleteTasks: ± Right-click to add or delete tasks
strings.oneDragon.uncoveredConfigsInIndependentT: (Configurations not covered here can be configured in Independent Tasks - Auto Domain)
strings.oneDragon.goToSpecifiedDomainConsumeResi: Go to specified domain to consume resin and automatically claim rewards.
strings.oneDragon.enterDomainSwitchTeamName: Team name to switch to upon entering domain:
strings.oneDragon.noteInGameSetName: Note: This is the name you set in-game.
strings.oneDragon.enabledWillDisableDailyConfig: When enabled, daily farming configuration will be disabled.
strings.oneDragon.cycleStartsAt4AM: Cycle starts at 4:00 AM. For example, Monday's domain is farmed from Monday 4:00 AM to Tuesday 3:59 AM.
strings.oneDragon.sundayOrLimitedThreeRewards: Sunday or limited three rewards, from top to bottom (1/2/3) sequence number:
strings.oneDragon.useCondensedFirstThenOriginal: Use Condensed first, then Original, no others.
strings.oneDragon.useResinAccordingToConfig: Use resin based on the configured amount below.
strings.oneDragon.goToSpecifiedRegionAdventurers: Go to specified region Adventurers' Guild to claim rewards.
strings.oneDragon.forSpecifiedTeamFriendship: For specified team to gain Friendship EXP.
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.title: Auto Salvage Artifacts
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.description: Automatically salvage artifacts below a specified star level.
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.maxStarTitle: Highest Star Level for Quick Artifact Salvage
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.maxStarDescription: Select the maximum star level of artifacts to automatically salvage.
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.maxCheckTitle: Maximum Number of Artifacts to Check
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.maxCheckDescription: Set the maximum number of artifacts to check to avoid infinite loops.
strings.artifact.autoSalvage.regexDescription: Used to match artifact substats to be kept. Matching artifacts will not be salvaged.
strings.task.autoDomain.title: Auto Domain
strings.task.autoDomain.teamNameNote: Note: Team name is the name you manually set in-game.
strings.task.autoDomain.selectDomainDescription: Automatically teleports to the domain to be farmed.
strings.task.autoDomain.useAllResinDescription: Prioritizes Condensed Resin, then Original Resin. Other types of Resin are not used.
strings.task.autoDomain.specifyResinUse: Specify Usage Count for Each Resin Type
strings.task.autoDomain.specifyResinUseDescripti: When enabled, uses corresponding Resin types according to configured counts.
strings.task.autoDomain.autoArtifactSalvageDescr: Highest star level for quick artifact salvage.
strings.task.autoDomain.fightEndDelayDescription: Delay after combat ends before looking for the petrified tree, allowing some character skills to fully finish.
strings.task.autoDomain.shortMovement: Use Small Steps When Looking for Petrified Tree (normal users should not enable)
strings.task.autoDomain.shortMovementDescription: If your computer performance is poor and looking for the petrified tree takes too long, you can try this feature.
strings.task.autoDomain.walkToF: Walk to F to Start Domain and Claim Rewards
strings.task.autoDomain.walkToFDescription: If your computer performance is poor and clicking F to start domain or claim rewards fails, you can try this feature.
strings.task.autoDomain.leftRightMoveTimes: Times to Move Left/Right to Confirm Position When Looking for Petrified Tree (normal users should not modify)
strings.task.autoDomain.leftRightMoveTimesDescri: Number of left/right movements to confirm position when walking in small steps.
strings.task.autoDomain.autoEatDescription: Please equip "NRE (Menu 30)" first. Automatically consumes food with the Z key when HP is low.
strings.task.autoDomain.reviveRetryCountDescript: Number of retries when a character dies during domain combat.
strings.task.autoFight.fastCheckParamsDescriptio: Parameters for faster combat end check, can be numbers and character names, separated by semicolons. For example: 5;Baizhu;Zhongli;. If a number (less than or equal to 0 means no time-based check, unit in seconds), it specifies the check interval. If a character name, the check is performed after that character completes one round of operations. The check after each round remains unchanged.
strings.task.autoFight.checkEndDelayDescription: Delay for checking combat end. The delay after different character's moves may not be the same, default is 1.5 seconds. Can also specify delay in seconds after specific characters. If no character name is specified, the default value is used. Format: 2.5;Baizhu,1.5;Zhongli,1.0;
strings.task.autoFight.beforeDetectDelay: Delay After Key Press Before Detection
strings.task.autoFight.beforeDetectDelayDescript: Delay after pressing a key to switch teams to check for screen color blocks, default is 0.45 seconds. If frequent misjudgments occur, this value can be appropriately increased, for example, to 0.75. Ensure this delay does not actually bring up the team configuration interface.
strings.task.autoFight.autoPickDropsDescription: Picks up drops around after combat as much as possible (better with Kazuha).
strings.task.autoFight.pickDropsDurationDescript: Unit in seconds. 0 means no auto-pickup of drops.
strings.task.autoFight.kazuhaPickup: Use Kazuha's Long E to Collect Drops After Combat
strings.task.autoFight.kazuhaPickupDescription: If Kaedehara Kazuha is in the party, his long E will be used to pick up drops after combat.
strings.task.autoFight.timeoutDescription: Automatically stops combat if it exceeds a certain duration.
strings.task.autoFishing.title: Full-Automatic Fishing (Single Fishing Spot)
strings.task.autoFishing.description: Do not bring a companion! Start this task where the fishing F button appears -
strings.task.autoFishing.hookTimeoutDescription: After this time, the rod will be automatically reeled in, and the bait will be re-identified and selected for casting.
strings.task.autoFishing.totalTimeoutDescription: After this time, the task will be forcibly ended.
strings.task.autoFishing.dayNightStrategyDescrip: Fish all day, fish only during day or night, or do not adjust time.
strings.task.autoFishing.saveKeyFrameScreenshotD: Saves screenshots at key judgment moments in the process for analysis. Will write a large amount of data, please disable when not debugging. Requires enabling screenshot function.
strings.task.autoFishing.torchLibraryDescription: and then fill in the full path to torch_cpu.dll or torch_cuda.dll. If it doesn't work, try restarting BGI.
strings.task.autoMusicGame.title: Auto Music Game (Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures)
strings.task.autoMusicGame.description: Can auto-play a single song or fully auto-complete an entire album -
strings.task.autoRedeemCode.description: Automatically use the entered redeem codes.
strings.task.autoStygianOnslaught.title: Auto Stygian Onslaught
strings.task.autoStygianOnslaught.description: Start this task from the interface after activating the key-
strings.oneDragon.actionsAfterTaskCompletion: Actions to perform after task completion.
strings.music.music.description: 进入演奏界面使用，下落模式必须选择垂落模式
strings.music.album.description: Used in the album interface, automatically plays uncompleted songs -
strings.music.album.mustCanorusTitle: 【Album】 Automatically play songs that have not achieved 【Canorus Greatness】
strings.music.album.mustCanorusDescription: When disabled, if rewards are claimed, the song will be skipped. When enabled, only if 【Canorus Greatness】 is achieved will the song be skipped.
strings.music.album.targetDifficultyTitle: 【Album】 Target Difficulty Selection for Auto Play
strings.music.album.targetDifficultyDescription: Set to 【Legendary】, 【Master】 to get all rewards. Set to 【All】 to automatically play all difficulties of the song.
